data.actual_result: The avatar has the normal height, but a very tiny width
data.expected_result: The avatar will display like it normally does in Discord
data.short_description: In the macOS Notification center, the avatar displays wrong for low-quality avatars
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone with a low-quality image for their avatar DM you (example avatar attached) - After you get the notification, click the notification button on the top right of the Mac top bar
